GSD.description:
selinux: fix double free of cond_list on error paths

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.8 by commit 7ed9cbf7ac0d4ed86b356e1b944304ae9ee450d4. For more details please see the references link.
